constraints: SSOT_INIT_PARAMS must remain small, stable, machine-readable, atomic, and idempotent; changes require explicit HITL record.
steps: Defined acceptance tests (EN) for SSOT_INIT_PARAMS to reduce ambiguity and support smaller/cheaper models.

checkpoints.title: SSOT_INIT_PARAMS acceptance tests

tests.name: Parseability
pass_criteria: README contains exactly one fenced code block labeled 'xml'
Code block contains exactly one <SSOT_INIT_PARAMS> root
Required tags exist and are non-empty: ORIGEM, INTENCAO_IMUTABILIDADE, EDICAO, REGRA_AGENTE, ITERACAO

tests.name: Change governance
pass_criteria: Any change to SSOT_INIT_PARAMS is recorded in runbook.decisions
Decision includes: id, scope='SSOT_INIT_PARAMS', change_summary, reason, approved_by, timestamp, atomic_unit, idempotency_note

tests.name: Non-interference
pass_criteria: XML block does not change README structure or readability
All README sections below remain intact

tests.name: Atomicity & Idempotency
pass_criteria: Each change to SSOT_INIT_PARAMS is one atomic unit (single purpose)
Change is idempotent: re-applying yields the same state with no additional side effects
Decision record includes atomic_unit and idempotency_note

how_to_run: Manual: inspect README.md for the fenced xml block and required tags.
Manual: after any edit to the XML block, append a decision entry under runbook.decisions with required fields.

decision_entry_template.change_summary: What changed in the SSOT_INIT_PARAMS XML block (1-3 lines).
decision_entry_template.reason: Why this change is needed (operator intent / governance reason).
decision_entry_template.atomic_unit: Describe the single atomic unit of change.
decision_entry_template.idempotency_note: Explain why re-applying this change yields the same state (no extra side effects).

results.notes: Baseline validation after adding SSOT_INIT_PARAMS + acceptance tests. No XML change performed in this run; governance tests pass by vacuity.

tests.notes: No SSOT_INIT_PARAMS change in this run (no decision entry required).
